name: Neutrogena Norwegian Formula Moisturizing Hand Cream for Dry, Rough Hands, Fragrance-Free Glycerin Hand Lotion for Softer Skin, Concentrated Intensive Hand Cream, 2 oz
short_description: 2-ounce fragrance-free Neutrogena Norwegian Formula Hand Cream delivers concentrated hydration to help moisturize and soothe rough, dry hands, making skin feel softer and smoother.
Dermatologist-recommended brand, this glycerin-rich moisturizing hand cream uses the classic Norwegian Formula to provide lasting relief for dry skin and support a healthier-looking skin texture.
Designed for dry hands, this fragrance-free hand lotion is clinically proven to improve dryness and help restore smoother, more comfortable skin.
Because of its highly concentrated formula, only a small dab of this intensive hand cream is needed—each 2 oz tube contains more than 200 applications for lasting use.
Use daily to help moisturize skin and prevent dryness; apply overnight for extra relief to help soften and soothe dry, rough skin.
product_description: Soothe and restore dry, rough hands with Neutrogena Norwegian Formula Hand Cream. This highly concentrated moisturizing hand lotion is clinically proven to deliver immediate and long lasting soothing relief for dry skin. Formulated with a high level of glycerin, this intensive hand cream locks in moisture and helps improve the look and feel of dry, chapped hands, leaving them noticeably softer and smoother. The fragrance-free formula is gentle and effective, making it ideal for everyday use, even for sensitive skin. Because it’s so concentrated, only a small dab is needed—each 2-ounce tube provides over 200 applications. Perfect for use at home, work, or on-the-go to help relieve dryness caused by frequent hand washing, weather conditions, and daily wear.
